thumb|The N'Zi near Dimbokro The Nzi River or N'zi River is a river in Ivory Coast. On 6 September 2016, the railway bridge over this river near Dimbokro collapsed.Railways Africa Nzi River bridge     References   Category:Rivers of Ivory Coast

The Buyo Dam is an embankment dam on the Sassandra River in the Bas-Sassandra district of Côte d'Ivoire.

Four survivors received first-degree burns from contact with jet fuel in the water. Forty-three of the deceased received first-degree burns due to contact with the jet fuel spilled in the water.
